welcome_text: The best way to adopt is found here
adoption_text: If you want to adopt a pet, we offer a wide variety of animals in need of a loving home. Each comes with detailed information to help you make the best decision.
give_for_adoption_text: We provide you with a simple form to share your pet's details. We ensure it is visible to those looking to adopt, helping you find a good home for your pet.
publicity_text: Here, veterinary clinics and specialized doctors can promote their services, providing the best care for pets. If you're a vet, this space is ideal for connecting with new clients and offering your animal care services.
sell_pets_text: You can buy pets through our platform, with the assurance that all animals meet health and welfare standards.
faq_text: In this section, you'll find various questions about our services
social_text: Find us on our social networks and be part of the Adopets family
contact_address: 650 meters southwest of the Red Cross, Nicoya, Guanacaste
faq_question_1: What should I know before buying a pet on Adopets?
faq_answer_1_1: It is always recommended to speak directly with the seller...
faq_answer_1_2: Ensure that the pet has all the necessary documentation...
faq_answer_1_3: Consider additional costs, such as transportation or future veterinary care.
faq_answer_1_4: Make sure the pet adapts to your environment and availability.
faq_answer_1_5: Ensure the seller is trustworthy and that the pet comes from a healthy environment.
faq_question_2: What should I consider before adopting a pet on Adopets?
faq_answer_2_1: Adopting a pet implies a lifelong care responsibility...
faq_answer_2_2: Make sure your home has enough space...
faq_answer_2_3: Consider expenses for food, veterinary care, and other supplies...
faq_answer_2_4: Some pets require more interaction and time...
faq_answer_2_5: Learn about return policies and evaluation processes...
faq_question_3: What should I know before giving my pet up for adoption on Adopets?
faq_answer_3_1: You must provide an accurate description of the pet...
faq_answer_3_2: Carefully evaluate interested adopters to ensure a suitable home...
faq_answer_3_3: In some cases, you may choose to maintain contact with the adopter...
faq_answer_3_4: Adoption may take time. Be patient until finding the best home...
faq_answer_3_5: Clarify the conditions under which you deliver the pet...
faq_question_4: What should I consider before advertising on Adopets?
faq_answer_4_1: Advertising on Adopets is primarily directed at pet enthusiasts...
faq_answer_4_2: Review the different advertising package options we offer...
faq_answer_4_3: Be sure to know how long your ad will be visible...
faq_answer_4_4: Take advantage of the platform's segmentation to ensure your ad reaches the most relevant audience.
